commit.message: Added Campaign::fromUtmz()
Implemented campaign tracking
Fixed error handling in Page::setLoadTime() and Config::setSitespeedSampleRate()
Implemented site speed tracking
Added Config::__construct() for convenience
Implemented error severity levels (silence, warnings, exceptions), had to make config static across all tracker instances for that
Improved Config::$sendOnShutdown functionality to assemble the final HTTP request just before sending it, so custom variables that were set later on will be included automatically
Implemented Config::$loggingCallback and ability to set the GA endpoint to null to simulate requests without actually sending them
Initial codebase import
Updated client version to 5.2.5, increased custom variable length from 64 bytes after encoding to 128 bytes before encoding like the ga.js release 2012-01 did
Implemented error severity levels (silence, warnings, exceptions), had to make config static across all tracker instances for that
Added some documentation details to CustomVariable
Initial codebase import
Implemented "non-interaction" parameter for event tracking, updated tracker version to 5.2.2
Implemented error severity levels (silence, warnings, exceptions), had to make config static across all tracker instances for that
Many minor docblock and documentation fixes and improvements
Initial codebase import
Implemented error severity levels (silence, warnings, exceptions), had to make config static across all tracker instances for that
Many minor docblock and documentation fixes and improvements
Initial codebase import

Renamed Item::$variation to Item::$category
getVariation()/setVariation() are still present for backwards-compatibility but marked as deprecated (thanks to filippo.desantis, https://code.google.com/p/php-ga/issues/detail?id=13)
Implemented error severity levels (silence, warnings, exceptions), had to make config static across all tracker instances for that

Fixed error handling in Page::setLoadTime() and Config::setSitespeedSampleRate()
Implemented site speed tracking
Implemented error severity levels (silence, warnings, exceptions), had to make config static across all tracker instances for that

Fixed Session::fromUtmb() (issue #14)
Added Session::fromUtmb()
Updated to client version 4.9.2: Implemented "utms" parameter and HTTP POST support for large requests
Initial codebase import
Implemented social interaction tracking

Added support for sending page information with events
Thanks to patches from GlaserFrank & ryan.mcgarrie (https://code.google.com/p/php-ga/issues/detail?id=16)
Updated client version to 5.2.5, increased custom variable length from 64 bytes after encoding to 128 bytes before encoding like the ga.js release 2012-01 did
Added support for mobile tracking IDs (e.g. MO-123456-7), implemented "utmip" parameter and IP anonymization, closes issue #9
Implemented social interaction tracking
Implemented campaign tracking
Reverted accidental commit of some methods related to campaign tracking in Tracker class
Implemented "non-interaction" parameter for event tracking, updated tracker version to 5.2.2
Fixed references to now static $config property in Tracker class
Implemented error severity levels (silence, warnings, exceptions), had to make config static across all tracker instances for that
Updated to client version 4.9.2: Implemented "utms" parameter and HTTP POST support for large requests
Many minor docblock and documentation fixes and improvements
Updated Tracker::VERSION to "4.9.1" to reflect current ga.js version
Initial codebase import
Implemented error severity levels (silence, warnings, exceptions), had to make config static across all tracker instances for that
Many minor docblock and documentation fixes and improvements
Initial codebase import

Fixed proxy support in Visitor::fromServerVar()
Thanks to sylph.lin (https://code.google.com/p/php-ga/issues/detail?id=38)
Fixed Visitor::fromServerVar() to parse "X_FORWARDED_FOR" with multiple IP addresses correctly, fixes issue #15
Added Visitor::fromUtma() and ::fromServerVar() methods for convenient visitor data propagation
Implemented error severity levels (silence, warnings, exceptions), had to make config static across all tracker instances for that
Implemented Visitor::$currentVisitTime together with ::addSession() method for easier visitor/session handling
Many minor docblock and documentation fixes and improvements
Initial codebase import
Minor docblock whitespace fix for ParameterHolder::$__utmv property
Implemented social interaction tracking
Implemented campaign tracking
Implemented "non-interaction" parameter for event tracking, updated tracker version to 5.2.2
Updated to client version 4.9.2: Implemented "utms" parameter and HTTP POST support for large requests
Added ParameterHolder::$utmu property for completeness/documentation reasons
Initial codebase import
Initial codebase import
Implemented site speed tracking
Made some minor documentation improvements to X10 class
Improved X10::renderDataType() (fixes issue #6)
Fixed encoding of numeric values in X10::escapeExtensibleValue()
Initial codebase import
FIX Notice: Undefined property: page

Added support for sending page information with events
Thanks to patches from GlaserFrank & ryan.mcgarrie (https://code.google.com/p/php-ga/issues/detail?id=16)
Implemented site speed tracking
Implemented "non-interaction" parameter for event tracking, updated tracker version to 5.2.2
Some minor docblock c&p fixes in EventRequest
Many minor docblock and documentation fixes and improvements
Fixed setting of event values in EventRequest::buildParameters(), closes issue #2
Initial codebase import
Fixed HttpRequest::_send() in "fireAndForget" mode to ensure the full request is always sent, fixes issue #11
Improved HttpRequest::buildHttpRequest() to skip empty userAgent and xForwardedFor values
Updated to client version 4.9.2: Implemented "utms" parameter and HTTP POST support for large requests
Improved Config::$sendOnShutdown functionality to assemble the final HTTP request just before sending it, so custom variables that were set later on will be included automatically
Implemented Config::$loggingCallback and ability to set the GA endpoint to null to simulate requests without actually sending them
Added proper escaping for "User-Agent" and "X-Forwarded-For" headers in HttpRequest::buildHttpRequest()
Many minor docblock and documentation fixes and improvements
Fixed encoding of spaces in HttpRequest::buildHttpRequest(), fixes issue #3
Initial codebase import

Renamed Item::$variation to Item::$category
getVariation()/setVariation() are still present for backwards-compatibility but marked as deprecated (thanks to filippo.desantis, https://code.google.com/p/php-ga/issues/detail?id=13)
Many minor docblock and documentation fixes and improvements

Added support for mobile tracking IDs (e.g. MO-123456-7), implemented "utmip" parameter and IP anonymization, closes issue #9

Implemented Visitor::$currentVisitTime together with ::addSession() method for easier visitor/session handling
Added building of client-side "__utmb" and "__utmc" cookie parameters to Request for the pure sake of completeness :)
Ensured correct locale format for "utmul" parameter
Updated to client version 4.9.2: Implemented "utms" parameter and HTTP POST support for large requests
Added sanity check for a maximum of 5 custom variables in any given request
Many minor docblock and documentation fixes and improvements
